About Me

I am currently a graduate of NYU Tandon majoring in Computer Engineering. In these past few years, I have dwelled in more computer science related concepts and built many programs and products that reflect on my learning experience. From a young teenager typing a paragaraph tag to now having the ability and skillset on developing multiple websites and algorithms. I will continue to keep striving for success and also pave the way for the next tech generation.



Times have changed, but the drive, relentlessness, and focus remains.

Tahmidur Rabb, 2023

Timeline

My history with tech

Summer 2013

Typed in first p tag in codeacademy

Fall 2015

Took first computer science class in high school. Designed first webpage and programmed a finch robot to dance. Learned about important computer science principles such as recursion and inheritence

Summer 2017

Interned at All Star Code at Yahoo Headquarters. Learned about fundamentals of web programming and worked on individual and group projects

2018 & 2019

Took first set of college courses in NYU. Interned at SCIP as a Web and App developer in the Microsoft building at Times Square.

2021

Took more advanced computer science courses. Built out portfolio and worked on other projects. Returned to All Star Code as a Teaching Assistant and interned at Stem-Away as a Project Lead/SWE intern

2022

Interned at Dominion Capital as a SWE intern

Worked as an IT Technician at NYU Enrollment Management Technology
